name: Digga
description:
LD48 entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/digga

Move LEFT & RIGHT, dig LEFT, RIGHT & DOWN.

Digging cost energy.

No more energy: game over.

Grab red pills to recharge a small amount of energy.

Finish level by reaching the door at the bottom to recharge some energy too.

Grab coins because everybody loves coins.

Dig bigger groups of blocks for even more coins...

Dig as deep as you can!

Note that you'll have to use mouse on non-game screens.
